Action.Name: DialogEX.FileBrowse
Action.Description: Presents a file browse dialog to the user to collect the path To a file.

Arg.Name: Title
Arg.Description: The text To be displayed on the dialog title bar.

Arg.Name: FileOpen
Arg.Description: Whether To make the dialog a "file open" dialog.

Arg.Name: Default
Arg.Description: The Default folder or file To browse.

Arg.Name: File Filters
Arg.Description: The file type filters that will be used in the dialog. EG: "Text Files(*.txt);*.txt|All Files(*.*);*.*".

Arg.Name: Default Filter
Arg.Description: This allows you To set the file filter that should be selected by Default.

Arg.Name: Display
Arg.Description: Where To display the dialog on the screen.

Arg.Name: X
Arg.Description: The X position of the dialog, (Ignored unless Display is set To DEX_SHOW_CUSTOM).

Arg.Name: Y
Arg.Description: The Y position of the dialog, (Ignored unless Display is set To DEX_SHOW_CUSTOM).

Arg.Name: Back Color
Arg.Description: The background color of the dialog.

Arg.Name: Front Color
Arg.Description: The text color of the dialog.

Arg.Name: Window Type
Arg.Description: What style To apply To the window.

Arg.Name: In Transition
Arg.Description: How To show the dialog.

Arg.Name: Delay
Arg.Description: The time of the transition.

Arg.Name: Out Transition
Arg.Description: How To exit the dialog.

Arg.Name: Timeout
Arg.Description: How long To display the dialog For (MS) (set To 0 To disable).

Action.Name: DialogEX.TimedCustomMessage
Action.Description: Presents a dialog To the user With an timed informative message on it, the user has xx amount of seconds To click a button.

Arg.Name: Title
Arg.Description: The text that will appear in the dialog title bar.

Arg.Name: Message Text
Arg.Description: The text that will appear on the dialog.

Arg.Name: Align Text
Arg.Description: Where To align the message text.

Arg.Name: Button Text
Arg.Description: A delimited string of the button titles, from 0 To 3 buttons (blank string ("") = 0 buttons, "Button1|Button 2|Button 3" = 3 buttons etc).

Arg.Name: Timed Button
Arg.Description: The index of the button that will dispaly the countdown timer, (1 = 1st button, 2 = 2nd etc, set to 0 to not display the countdown).

Arg.Name: Forced Return
Arg.Description: Forced Return For when the dialog timesout (counter reached zero), this is to force the return of the selecded button if the dialog timesout.

Arg.Name: Time
Arg.Description: The time in miliseconds to show the dialog, the count down will be displayed in the button set in "TimedButton".

Arg.Name: Width
Arg.Description: The width of the dialog.

Arg.Name: Height
Arg.Description: The Height of the dialog.

Arg.Name: Display
Arg.Description: Where To display the dialog on the screen.

Arg.Name: X
Arg.Description: The X position of the dialog, (Ignored unless Display is set To DEX_SHOW_CUSTOM).

Arg.Name: Y
Arg.Description: The Y position of the dialog, (Ignored unless Display is set To DEX_SHOW_CUSTOM).

Arg.Description: The background color of the dialog.

Arg.Description: How To exit the dialog.
